member.name: T:Moon.Migrations.AddForeignKeyExtensions
member.summary: AddForeignKey migration context extension.

member.name: M:Moon.Migrations.AddForeignKeyExtensions.AddForeignKey(Moon.Migrations.IMigrationContext,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Data.Rule,System.Data.Rule,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Adds an operation to create a new foreign key constraint.
member.param: The migration context.
The table that contains the foreign key column. Schema name is optional, if no schema is specified then dbo is assumed.
The foreign key column.
The table that contains the column this foreign key references. Schema name is optional, if no schema is specified then dbo is assumed.
The column this foreign key references. The default value is "Id".
A value indicating how delete action should be configured for the foreign key relationship. If no value is supplied, cascade delete will be off.
A value indicating how update action should be configured for the foreign key relationship. If no value is supplied, cascade delete will be off.
A value indicating whether to enforce foreign key constraint.
The name of the foreign key constraint in the database. If no value is supplied a unique name will be generated.

member.name: M:Moon.Migrations.AddForeignKeyExtensions.AddForeignKey(Moon.Migrations.IMigrationContext,System.String,System.String[],System.String,System.String[],System.Data.Rule,System.Data.Rule,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Adds an operation to create a new foreign key constraint.
member.param: The migration context.
The table that contains the foreign key columns. Schema name is optional, if no schema is specified then dbo is assumed.
The foreign key columns.
The table that contains the columns this foreign key references. Schema name is optional, if no schema is specified then dbo is assumed.
The columns this foreign key references. The default value is "Id".
A value indicating how delete action should be configured for the foreign key relationship. If no value is supplied, cascade delete will be off.
A value indicating how update action should be configured for the foreign key relationship. If no value is supplied, cascade delete will be off.
A value indicating whether to enforce foreign key constraint.
The name of the foreign key constraint in the database. If no value is supplied a unique name will be generated.

member.summary: Adds an operation to add a column to an existing table.

The SQL to be executed.
A value indicating if the SQL should be executed outside of the transaction being used for the migration process. If no value is supplied the SQL will be executed within the transaction.

The name of the column to create the index on.
A value indicating if this is a unique index. If no value is supplied a non-unique index will be created.
The name to use for the index in the database. If no value is supplied a unique name will be generated.
A value indicating whether or not this is a clustered index.
The condition used to create filtered index.

The condition used to create filtered index.

member.summary: Adds an operation to create a new table.
member.typeparam: The columns in this create table operation. You do not need to specify this type, it will be inferred from the columnsAction parameter you supply.
member.param: The migration context.
The name of the table. Schema name is optional, if no schema is specified then dbo is assumed.
An action that specifies the columns to be included in the table. i.e. t => new { Id = t.Int(identity: true), Name = t.String() }
member.returns: An object that allows further configuration of the table creation operation.

member.summary: Specifies a primary key for the table.
member.param: The name of the primary key. If null is supplied, a default name will be generated.
A value indicating whether or not this is a clustered primary key.
member.returns: Itself, so that multiple calls can be chained.

member.name: M:Moon.Migrations.TableBuilder`1.Index(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{`0,System.Object}},System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Specifies an index to be created on the table.
member.param: A value indicating whether or not this is a unique index.
A value indicating whether or not this is a clustered index.
The condition used to create filtered index.
member.returns: Itself, so that multiple calls can be chained.

member.name: M:Moon.Migrations.TableBuilder`1.ForeignKey(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression{System.Func{`0,System.Object}},System.String,System.String[],System.Data.Rule,System.Data.Rule,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Specifies a foreign key constraint to be created on the table.
member.param: A lambda expression representing the properties of the foreign key. C#: t => t.PropertyOne VB.Net: Function(t) t.PropertyOne If multiple properties make up the foreign key then specify an anonymous type including the properties. C#: t => new { t.PropertyOne, t.PropertyTwo } VB.Net: Function(t) New With { t.PropertyOne, t.PropertyTwo }
Name of the table that the foreign key constraint targets.
The columns this foreign key references. The default value is "Id".
A value indicating how delete action should be configured on the foreign key constraint.
A value indicating how update action should be configured on the foreign key constraint.
A value indicating whether to enforce foreign key constraint.
The name of this foreign key constraint. If no name is supplied, a default name will be calculated.
member.returns: Itself, so that multiple calls can be chained.
